name: Mobile Soccer Cartoon 2018
description:
Have you ever felt the spirits giving you the strength to overcome the toughest tests life can put in front of you? As the captain of this manga football team you are not only in charge of leading the players, but also you must never let them down and fight until the end of the tournament. Ancestors and spirits can encourage you to win this match but your football team is your best booster you have in the soccer pitch. Count on them to break all the free kick records and proclaim yourself best goal scorer of this anime league. The team counts on its captain!

Confront the most aggressive yandere scorer rivals of the league. Fight head to head against your opponents to score the goal your team is waiting for. This is not only soccer: this is life. You are a real senpai in this manga soccer game. Fantasy and heroes await for the ultimate captain. Do not trust in the kawaii and friendly aspects of your rivals. They will shoot the ball, dribble, and kick the penalties only to win! You must be better than them! Compete now in this manga soccer game to impress your football team as the best captain ever! Become the top goal scorer of the league in this thrilling kawaii cartoon soccer adventure!

Start practicing to become the football captain your anime soccer team needs! Do your best and lead your players to the victory in this manga soccer game! Proclaim yourself top goal scorer of the league! Make the spirits proud!

Get the most out of the amazing features of this anime football game!
- Enjoy the amazing manga and anime graphics!
- Complete the different levels to unlock more tournaments and leagues!
- Obtain stars in every level to buy item packs to unleash the power of the captain!
- Score the required goal depending on the game mode: free kick, penalty, obstacles...
- Share your achievements with your friends and compete against other football captains!
- Break all the manga captain records and get to the top of the leaderboards!

Kick off the ball now and start scoring your first goal to take your team to the top of this anime league. Beat all the rival heroes and become the best football captain and goal scorer ever! What are your waiting for to start enjoying this anime game? Play now!
